The script is looking in submodules directory for the repo root. The
  export file is in the actual project root. Let me check what the script is
   expecting and run it properly:

Bash(cd /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master && ls -la
      *EXPORT*.txt)
-rw-------@ 1 halcasteel  staff  63198 Nov 19 22:30 2025-11-19-EXPORT-C    ODITECT-REORG-SUBMODULES.txt

The file exists but the script isn't finding it. The script seems to be
  searching in submodules as the repo root. Let me move the export file to
  where the script expects it or pass the file directly:

Bash(mv /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/2025-11-19-EXPORT-C
      ODITECT-REORG-SUBMODULES.txt
      /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/MEMORY-…)

The script is looking in coditect-rollout-master/submodules/MEMORY-CONTEXT
   but the actual MEMORY-CONTEXT is at
  coditect-rollout-master/MEMORY-CONTEXT. The script has the wrong path. Let
   me check and work around this:

Bash(ls -la /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/MEMORY-CONTEXT/
      *EXPORT*.txt 2>/dev/null)

-rw-------@ 1 halcasteel  staff  63198 Nov 19 22:30 /Users/halcasteel/P    ROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/MEMORY-CONTEXT/2025-11-19-EXPORT-CODITE
    CT-REORG-SUBMODULES.txt

The export file is there. The issue is the script is resolving the repo
  root incorrectly because it's being run from the working directory. Let me
   check the script to understand its path resolution:

Search(pattern: "repo_root|MEMORY-CONTEXT", path:
        ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py", output_mode: "content")

Bash(head -100 /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/.coditect/sc
      ripts/export-dedup.py | grep -E "root|MEMORY|find_export|search")

1. Find export files (flexible multi-location search)       • Repo root (shallow)
       • MEMORY-CONTEXT (shallow)
     … +12 lines (ctrl+o to expand)
Let me see how repo_root is being determined:

Search(pattern: "repo_root\s*=|script_dir", path:
        ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py", output_mode: "content")

Let me look at the script's main function to see how it determines the
  repo root:

Bash(grep -n "def main\|Path(__file__)\|submodules" /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS
      /coditect-rollout-master/.coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py | head -30)

17:  • All submodules (recursive)     34:sys.path.insert(0, str(Path(__file__).parent / "core"))
     98:    # 4. Search submodules directory (recursive)
     … +12 lines (ctrl+o to expand)

Found the issue! The script calculates repo_root as
  Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent.parent.parent which would be:

  .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py → parent (scripts) → parent (.coditect)
  → parent (coditect-core-dotclaude) → parent (core) - this results in
  submodules/core not the actual repo root.

  Since .coditect is symlinked, the path resolution is wrong. The script is
  looking at submodules as the repo root because the symlink chain leads
  there.

  Let me trace the actual path:

Script: /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/submodules/c    ore/coditect-core-dotclaude/scripts/export-dedup.py
    Parent^1: /Users/halcasteel/PROJECTS/coditect-rollout-master/submodules
    … +6 lines (ctrl+o to expand)

Confirmed! The script's repo_root resolves to submodules instead of
  coditect-rollout-master. This is because the symlink .coditect resolves to
   the actual location in submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude.

  The script needs to go up 5 levels, not 4. Let me fix the script:

I need to fix the path resolution. The script is in .coditect/scripts/ but
   .coditect is a symlink to submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude. So the
   resolved path is:
  - Script actual location:
  submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude/scripts/export-dedup.py
  - Needs to go up 5 levels to reach coditect-rollout-master
Update(submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude/scripts/export-dedup.py)
Read(submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude/scripts/export-dedup.py)
Read 20 lines

       173            archive: Move processed exports to archive
       174        """
       175    
       176 -      # Paths
       177 -      repo_root = 
           - Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent.parent.parent
       176 +      # Paths - Script is at .coditect/scripts/ which 
           + symlinks to submodules/core/coditect-core-dotclaude/scripts/
       177 +      # So we need to go up 5 levels: scripts -> 
           + coditect-core-dotclaude -> core -> submodules -> repo_root
       178 +      repo_root = 
           + Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent.parent.parent.parent
       179        framework_root = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
       180        memory_context_dir = repo_root / "MEMORY-CONTEXT"
       181        archive_dir = memory_context_dir / "exports-archive"
